text: China has lots of places to visit; from the cold Harbin (哈尔滨) to the sunny Hainan Islands (海南岛).如果你喜欢冬天，可以去哈尔滨，它在中国的最北边，冬天会下雪，可以去“冰雪大世界”玩儿。如果你喜欢夏天，可以去海南岛，它在中国的最南边，有大海、沙滩和热情的人们。China has a lot of interesting places.If you like winter, you can go to Harbin in the northernmost part of China. It will snow in winter, you can go to see the “Ice and Snow World”.If you like summer, you can go to Hainan Island. It is in the southernmost part of China. Hainan has sea, beaches, and warmhearted people.
